meanings.definition: A rank in the military above a lieutenant colonel and below a brigadier general.
meanings.sent1: The colonels led the troops into battle.
meanings.sent2: The army consisted of many colonels.
meanings.sent3: The colonels decided to have a picnic on the battlefield.
meanings.sent4: In the chess game of war, the colonels are the knights.
meanings.sent5: The colonels' uniforms shone brightly in the sun.
